Item.description: A throwing knife made out of titanium-femboyium alloy granting it exceptional throwing capabilities and armor penetration.

Item.description: A steel forged throwing axe capable of tearing people and shields equaly. Great to detroy single targets.

adrenalineshot.name: Adrenaline shot
adrenalineshot.description: A syringe filled with adrenaline, able to instantly heal an ally (or enemy if you have bad aim) back from unconsciousness. Most effective if used on a unconscious ally, ineffective if used in a dead one. Should only be applied by trained professionals.

Item.description: Slug shell for shotgun. Use at your own risk

Item.description: A huge, unstoppable force.
